articles.content: // IN A WORLD WHERE EVERYBODY ARE CONSTANTLY ONLINE AND EVERYTHING IS A CLICK AWAY WHEREVER YOU ARE, IT IS INTERESTING TO EXAMINE THE CONCEPT OF WANDERING IN THE VIRTUAL ENVIRONMENT AND THE REAL WORLD.
PING MY HISTORY ALLOWING YOU TO EXPLORE YOUR WANDERING BY PINING ALL YOUR HISTORY PAGES ON A MAP ACCORDING TO YOUR DEVICES PHYSICAL LOCATION AND BY THE PAGES STORAGE LOCATION
